post.description:
Query the NDB model with specified parameters.

Parameters:
- base_params: BaseQueryParams - Basic query parameters.
    - query: str - The query text.
    - top_k: int - The number of top results to return (default: 5).
- ndb_params: Optional[NDBExtraParams] - Extra NDB-specific query parameters.
    - rerank: bool - Whether to rerank the results (default: False).
    - top_k_rerank: int - The number of top results to rerank (default: 100).
    - context_radius: int - The context radius for the results (default: 1).
    - rerank_threshold: float - The threshold for reranking (default: 1.5).
    - top_k_threshold: Optional[int] - The threshold for top_k results.
    - constraints: Constraints - Additional constraints for the query.
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: The query results.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "base_params": {
        "query": "What is the capital of France?",
        "top_k": 5
    },
    "ndb_params": {
        "rerank": true,
        "top_k_rerank": 100,
        "context_radius": 1,
        "rerank_threshold": 1.5,
        "constraints": {
            "field1": {
                "constraint_type": "AnyOf",
                "values": ["value1", "value2"]
            },
            "field2": {
                "constraint_type": "InRange",
                "minimum": 0,
                "maximum": 10,
                "inclusive_min": true,
                "inclusive_max": true
            }
        }
    }
}
```

Upvote specific text-id pairs.

Parameters:
- input: UpvoteInput - The upvote input containing text-id pairs.
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: Upvote success message.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "text_id_pairs": [
        {"query_text": "What is AI?", "reference_id": 1},
        {"query_text": "What is machine learning?", "reference_id": 2}
    ]
}
```

Associate text pairs in the model.

Parameters:
- input: AssociateInput - The associate input containing text pairs.
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: Association success message.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "text_pairs": [
        {"source": "AI", "target": "Artificial Intelligence"},
        {"source": "ML", "target": "Machine Learning"}
    ]
}
```

get.description:
Get the sources used in the model.

Parameters:
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: The list of sources.

Example Response Body:
```
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Successful",
    "data": ["source1", "source2", "source3"]
}
```

post.description:
Delete sources from the model.

Parameters:
- input: DeleteInput - The input containing source IDs to be deleted.
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: Deletion success message.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "source_ids": ["source1", "source2"]
}
```

Save the current state of the NDB model.

Parameters:
- input: SaveModel - The input parameters for saving the model.
- token: str - Authorization token.
- override_permission: bool - Whether the user has permission to override the model.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: Save success message.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "override": false,
    "model_name": "new_model_name"
}
```

Insert documents into the model.

Parameters:
- documents: str - The documents to be inserted in JSON format.
- files: List[UploadFile] - Optional list of files to be uploaded.
- input_mode: str - Mode of insertion ("sync" or "async").
- token: str - Authorization token.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: Insertion success message.

Example Request Body (Sync Mode):
```
{
    "documents": [
        {
            "location": "local",
            "document_type": "PDF",
            "path": "/path/to/file.pdf",
            "metadata": {"author": "John Doe"},
            "chunk_size": 100,
            "stride": 40,
            "emphasize_first_words": 0,
            "ignore_header_footer": true,
            "ignore_nonstandard_orientation": true
        }
    ],
    "input_mode": "sync"
}
```

Example Request Body (Async Mode):
```
{
    "documents": [
        {
            "location": "local",
            "document_type": "PDF",
            "path": "/path/to/file.pdf",
            "metadata": {"author": "John Doe"},
            "chunk_size": 100,
            "stride": 40,
            "emphasize_first_words": 0,
            "ignore_header_footer": true,
            "ignore_nonstandard_orientation": true
        }
    ],
    "input_mode": "async"
}
```

Get the status of a specific task.

Parameters:
- task_id: str - The ID of the task.

Returns:
- JSONResponse: The status of the task.

Example Request Body:
```
{
    "task_id": "1234-5678-91011-1213"
}
```

Example Response Body:
```
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Information for task 1234-5678-91011-1213",
    "data": {
        "status": "in_progress",
        "action": "insert",
        "last_modified": "2024-07-31T12:34:56.789Z",
        "documents": [...],
        "message": "",
        "data": null,
        "token": "token_value"
    }
}
```

AnyOf.title: AnyOf
AnyOf.description: Represents a constraint where the value must be one of the specified values.

AssociateInput.title: AssociateInput
AssociateInput.description: Represents a list of source-target pairs for association.

AssociateInputSingle.title: AssociateInputSingle
AssociateInputSingle.description: Represents a single source-target pair for association.

Constraints.title: Constraints
Constraints.description: Root model for a collection of constraints.

DeleteInput.title: DeleteInput
DeleteInput.description: Represents a list of source IDs to be deleted.

EqualTo.title: EqualTo
EqualTo.description: Represents a constraint where the value must be equal to the specified value.

GreaterThan.title: GreaterThan
GreaterThan.description: Represents a constraint where the value must be greater than the specified minimum.

InRange.title: InRange
InRange.description: Represents a constraint where the value must be within the specified range.

LessThan.title: LessThan
LessThan.description: Represents a constraint where the value must be less than the specified maximum.

NDBExtraParams.title: NDBExtraParams
NDBExtraParams.description: Represents extra parameters for NDB search queries.

SaveModel.title: SaveModel
SaveModel.description: Represents the parameters for saving a model.

UpvoteInput.title: UpvoteInput
UpvoteInput.description: Represents a list of query-reference pairs for upvoting.

UpvoteInputSingle.title: UpvoteInputSingle
UpvoteInputSingle.description: Represents a single query-reference pair for upvoting.
